Battleship

Instructions:

1) Place your ships onto your board by dragging them over. Rotate the ships as you like.

2) Attack the computer's ship by clicking and making attacks on the attack grid.

3) Alternate turns with the computer and try to sink all of its ships before it sinks your ships.
